CatDescriptText: Warren "Country" Barriton was part of the "Pittsburghers Speak Out" column published in New Pittsburgh Courier newspaper, October 21, 1972, page 4, with question: "Pittsburghers were asked if they felt the Black community is being exploited by the recent upsurge of Black movies" Answer reads: "I think all black movies that have been made should be banned.  The best movies I've seen is "Planet of the Apes" because all the whities were getting killed."
TitMainTitle: Portrait of Warren "Country" Barriton posed holding a pool cue outside of building
